
{{alias}}()
    Test if a value is a `Date` object.

    Parameters
    ----------
    value: any
        value to test.

    Returns
    -------
    y: boolean
        boolean indicating if a value is a `Date` object.

    Examples
    --------
    > var bool = {{alias}}( new Date() )
    true

    > bool = {{alias}}( '2017-01-01' )
    false

    See Also
    --------
